meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for the insertion and preservation of collections, as of stamps or photographs.
meanings.sent1: I filled my album with colorful stamps from different countries.
meanings.sent2: She kept her family photos in a beautiful album.
meanings.sent3: The album looked sad because it had no stamps to keep it company.
meanings.sent4: Her album was a treasure chest of memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The album was like a time capsule, holding precious moments frozen in time.

meanings.definition: A collection of recordings, typically on a compact disc or vinyl record, released as a single item.
meanings.sent1: I bought the latest album from my favorite band.
meanings.sent2: His album had all the hit songs from the 80s.
meanings.sent3: The album started playing music on its own, surprising everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: Listening to the album was like taking a journey through different emotions.
meanings.sent5: The album was a musical masterpiece that touched the hearts of many listeners.
